response.name: Create user - 400 BAD REQ
response.body: Error: Ya existe un usuario con este correo

response.name: Modify User - 409 pass
response.body: The password was not modified. Please try Forgot My Password in Login, try again later.

response.name: Modify User - 409 dni
response.body: Contact with your manager to modify dni, try again later.

response.name: Update alias - 400
Delete card - 404
